title: Your Love Is Your Sweet Lies
alternative_title: Amai Koi ni wa Kimi no Uso
status: Amai Koi ni wa Kimi no Uso
description:
Description :
        From Shinmakoku Scanlations: How far would you lie to get the person you love? How far would you try to get a chance at love? Ibuki and Keisuke have to find a way for their love to get through a jumble of lies!
